data.title: 2023 Hale ‘Aina Award Winners: The Best Restaurants in Hawai‘i
data.meta_description: Here are the winners of this year’s Hale ‘Aina dining awards, including best new restaurant and restaurateur of the year.
data.text:
We asked, more than 15,000 votes were cast, and now it’s time to unveil the winners of the 2023 Hale ‘Aina Awards!

Each year, our readers vote for their favorite restaurants in the Islands, and the HONOLULU dining team names the Restaurateur of the Year and Best New Restaurant. The top restaurants were announced during a live reception held June 6, 2023, at the Ritz-Carlton Residences’ Lau‘ula Park.

See our upcoming September 2023 issue for the stories behind some of the Hale ‘Aina Award honorees. Subscribe now to have our Hale ‘Aina Awards issue delivered right to your home.

The Hale ‘Aina Awards are the state’s longest-running and most prestigious dining honors, started by HONOLULU Magazine in 1984 to elevate the best restaurants in Hawai‘i. Whether you’re looking for weekend brunch spots, your new favorite cocktail or the best places to indulge your sweet tooth, we got you. This list of Hale ‘Aina-winning restaurants is your all-year, can’t-miss dining guide.

Congratulations to this year’s winners for operating at the highest levels of quality and offering Hawai‘i’s most delicious and innovative dishes.

SEE ALSO: Déjà Food: A Look Back at Past Hale ʻAina Awards and Winners

Restaurateurs of the Year

Robynne Maii and Chuck Bussler

Fête

SEE ALSO: The Secret Ingredient to Being Restaurateurs of the Year

Best New Restaurant

Nami Kaze

SEE ALSO: Kampai at the Pier: Nami Kaze Is the Best New Restaurant of 2023

Best O‘ahu Restaurant

GOLD – Merriman’s Honolulu

SILVER – Miro Kaimukī

BRONZE – Restaurant Suntory

FINALIST – Mahina & Sun’s

SEE ALSO: Are These the Most Beautiful Restaurants in Honolulu?
